****************************************************************** Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
We wanted to update you on the issues that you experienced while attempting to assign a custom domain to your store.
There was a issue created when we did some internal migrations --- which you experienced first hand when attempting to assign a custom domain to your store. Our Technical Operations team has resolved the issue, so you should now be able to successfully assign a custom domain to your store.
Here is an article from our knowledge base if you need more information on how to assign it:
https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Changing-Your-Store-s-Domain/?q=domain&l=en_US&fs=Search&pn=1
If you need assistance in getting it setup, please feel free to reach out to our support team 24 x 7 via phone or chat.
We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your business!
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
